levels.title: Competent
criteria: Consistently produces great quality concepts for creative campaigns and projects
Maintains consistency and quality when delivering and approving creative across the team
Demonstrates the ability to deliver and identify creative that answers the needs of the client and the audience
Strong contributor to ideation, concept and design stages of campaigns and projects, working closely with the project team
Consistently collaborates cross functionally with relevant internal and external stakeholders and departments
Delivers engaging and informative presentations to all internal audiences
Liaises with external 3rd parties, e.g. Photo studios, agencies, printers
Developing the skills to work under minimal supervision and with independent judgement
Demonstrates strong understanding of how your work fits into the bigger strategic picture
Understand the cause and effects of your work on the business and other departments
Good commercial awareness - youâ€™ll generate innovative yet commercially-viable concepts and solutions.
Build relationships with other stakeholders and departments to deliver on business objectives.
Consistently lead by example to influence others and creates camaraderie as part of the team
Puts the customer at the heart of what they do
You will evaluate and measure your own performance and seek feedback for continuous improvement.
